items.title: Trump claims Europe doesn't buy American cars or food. Is that true?
items.summary: President Trump threatens to raise tariffs on EU claiming they don't buy US cars or food, but data shows otherwise.

items.title: Alaska Air: Los Angeles – Newark (and vice versa). $197 (Basic Economy) / $287 (Regular Economy). Roundtrip, including all Taxes
items.summary: Alaska Air is offering discounted fares between Los Angeles and Newark, with prices ranging from $197 for Basic Economy to $287 for Regular Economy. The Regular Economy fare includes advance seat assignment and a normal size carry-on.

items.title: 7 reasons why I bought the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and why you should too
items.summary: Samsung has started taking pre-orders for the new Galaxy Z Flip 7, featuring significant upgrades and improvements. The phone is considered the flip phone to beat, with several meaningful changes that elevate its status in the market.

items.title: lightman-ai 0.16.1
items.summary: The latest version of lightman-ai, 0.16.1, serves as a cybersecurity news aggregator that provides updates and information on cybersecurity threats. This tool can help organizations stay informed and proactive in protecting their systems and data.

items.title: Deals: Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra up to $400 off, FREE Buds 3 Pro w/ Flip 7, Google Smart TV + FREE 43-inch model, more
items.summary: Deals on Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra offer up to $400 off, with additional free accessories like Buds 3 Pro and Google Smart TV; various retailers have discounts on the device, including an open-box model at Best Buy.

items.title: Trump Administration Issues New Guidelines for Religious Workers
items.summary: The Trump Administration has issued new guidelines for religious federal workers on working from home, with the use of AI-generated voice technology. Inconsistencies may occur due to the nature of AI-generated speech.

items.title: Numerai Announces $1 Million Strategic Buyback of NMR
items.summary: Numerai announces a $1 million strategic buyback of NMR tokens, as the crowdsourced hedge fund sees growth in assets under management and its Meta Model leads. This move demonstrates economic strategy in the AI and decentralized finance space.

items.title: Numerai Announces $1M Strategic Buyback of NMR
items.summary: Numerai, a crowdsourced hedge fund, announced a $1 million strategic buyback of NMR tokens as their Meta Model leads amid asset under management growth.

items.title: Kids Fail When Adults Don't Care
items.summary: Kids struggle when people see them as data points instead of whole people. Cultural connection and empathy can change this.

items.summary: 'Assassin's Creed' Live-Action Series Greenlit at Netflix - Voice is AI-generated. Inconsistencies may occur.

items.title: Can California High-Speed Rail Survive Trump's $4 Billion Cuts?
items.summary: President Donald Trump revokes $4 billion in federal funding from California's high-speed rail program, raising doubts about the project's future.

items.title: Natural Gas Is America's Strategic Advantage Fueling The AI Race
items.summary: Natural gas is being seen as America's strategic advantage in fueling the AI race, which is defining economic and technological competition globally.

items.title: Review: Donkey Kong Bananza Is a Smashing Good Time
items.summary: Donkey Kong Bananza is a new game featuring Donkey Kong, generated by AI voice. The game marks the return of the popular character after 11 years.

items.title: VideoAmp Appoints Peter Liguori as CEO
items.summary: VideoAmp appoints Peter Liguori as CEO after his previous roles as executive chairman and member of the board for five years.

items.title: Gmail brings one-click appointment booking right to your inbox
items.summary: Gmail introduces one-click appointment booking feature by integrating with Google Calendar, allowing users to add appointment booking page into email drafts.

items.title: How money or donations shape what we share about nature
items.summary: Voluntary contributions from citizens are increasingly used to monitor biodiversity, but a new study led by the University of Osaka and the National Institute explores what motivates people to participate and how incentives influence the kind of data they provide.

items.title: NASA’s new Roman Space Telescope aims to discover 100,000 cosmic explosions
items.summary: NASA's new Roman Space Telescope aims to discover 100,000 cosmic explosions and find more 'kilonovae' when it launches in 2027.

items.summary: runagent 0.1.5 is a command-line tool and SDK for deploying, managing, and interacting with AI agents.

items.title: Linux market share just crossed 5%, hitting a new milestone

items.title: evalstack 0.0.2
items.summary: Evalstack 0.0.2 offers AI-driven analysis and evaluation for policy workflows, regardless of the framework being used.

items.title: Too Much Hype, Too Few Profits. Tesla Stock Fans Should Heed This Warning Before July 23.
items.summary: Tesla stock fans should be cautious of the hype surrounding AI before their upcoming earnings report on July 23, as the company has yet to translate AI advancements into profits.

items.title: Off The Grid free-to-play battle royale has officially launched on Steam
items.summary: Off The Grid, a free-to-play battle royale set in a cyberpunk dystopia, has officially launched on Steam with cyberlimbs to loot and unique abilities enabled by them.

items.title: Liberty Announces Upsize to C$4.4 Million of Equity Financing Due to Demand
items.summary: Liberty announces upsizing of equity financing to C$4.4 million due to demand, not for distribution to U.S. newswires or dissemination in the United States.

items.title: You’re Not Imagining It: AI Is Already Taking Tech Jobs
items.summary: Since the rise of generative AI, many have feared the toll it would take on the livelihood of human workers. Now CEOs are admitting AI’s impact and layoffs are starting to ramp up.

items.title: ChatGPT helps write this mayor’s speeches. Now he wants a thousand city workers using AI
items.summary: ChatGPT is being used to help write speeches for the mayor of San Jose, California, and now he wants a thousand city workers to use AI as well.

items.title: Church Accuses Donald Trump of 'Domestic Terrorism'
items.summary: A church accuses Donald Trump of 'domestic terrorism' for ICE raids, stating the administration is 'weaponizing the constitution'.

items.title: TSMC and Nvidia are latest bullish reads on AI demand: Opening Bid top takeaways
items.summary: TSMC and Nvidia are showing bullish reads on AI demand, with markets stabilizing after a Trump-fueled tizzy. President Trump reportedly discussed firing Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.

items.title: Google gets unexpected boost from ChatGPT
items.summary: Google is leveraging ChatGPT for AI advancements, focusing on scale, speed, and under-the-radar systems.

items.title: Rescue Pug Separated From Brother at 8 Weeks Old, 'Fate' Reunites Them
items.summary: A dog owner shares the story of her rescue pug being reunited with his brother after being separated at a young age. The use of AI-generated voice technology to tell the story may lead to inconsistencies.

items.title: Study: AI Boosts Productivity for 72% of Users
items.summary: Study shows that 72% of users are experiencing increased productivity thanks to AI, according to The AI Guide: How the UK is Using AI at Home and Work.

items.title: Jamie Dimon turned down Jeff Bezos and a top gig at Amazon to take on ‘troubled’ Bank One in a $60 million bet
items.summary: Jamie Dimon chose to take on a challenging role at Bank One instead of joining Amazon, showing a $60 million bet on the banking industry.

items.summary: PropStream, a Stewart Information Services Corporation company, acquires BatchLeads and BatchDialer products to expand their technology offerings.

items.title: The FCC wants to ban Chinese tech from the undersea cables that connect the U.S. to the rest of the world — proposed new rules would 'secure cables against foreign adversaries'
items.summary: The FCC plans to ban Chinese tech from undersea cables to protect against foreign adversaries like China and accelerate the buildout of AI infrastructure.

items.title: Would Customers Pay for Premium Customer Experience?
items.summary: AI is making human support a luxury, with some brands testing whether customers will pay extra for better service.

items.title: Letters to Editor
items.summary: The Letters to Editor section discussed the implications of AI technology and its potential impact on society. Various viewpoints were expressed regarding the ethical considerations and applications of AI in different sectors.

items.summary: Understanding public thinking about AI can inform companies' decisions on developing and training AI tools.

items.title: Jack Ciattarelli's Chances of Beating Sherrill and Flipping New Jersey—poll
items.summary: Republican Jack Ciattarelli is trailing behind Democrat Mikie Sherrill in the race for New Jersey governor according to a new internal poll from Ciattarelli's campaign.

items.title: Okta Patent Disrupts AI-Fueled Phishing Attacks
items.summary: Okta has patented technology to disrupt AI-fueled phishing attacks, as phishing attempts become more advanced in the age of AI.

items.title: Kylie Jenner's Make-Up Video With Daughter Stormi, 7, Raises Questions
items.summary: Kylie Jenner's make-up video featuring her AI-generated voice for her daughter raises questions about the ethics of using AI in such personal and intimate situations.

items.title: Digi Power X Stock Jumps After Deal With Supermicro To Roll Out Nvidia-Powered AI Systems
items.summary: Digi Power X stock rose after securing a deal with Supermicro to provide AI systems powered by Nvidia GPUs for its Tier 3 modular AI infrastructure.

items.title: Alaska Resident Captures Terrifying Moment Home Shakes Amid Earthquake
items.summary: A viral video shared on TikTok shows a home shaking during an earthquake in Alaska, capturing a terrifying moment. The video, posted by @nicoledemoski, has gained over 741,000 views since Thursday.

items.title: Russia's Oil Prices Lag Behind Target
items.summary: Russia's oil prices are lagging behind government targets, putting more strain on the economy during a turbulent wartime period.

items.title: States Take the Lead in Regulating American AI Development
items.summary: States are taking the lead in regulating American AI development as the Senate removed a 10-year prohibition on states enacting their own AI laws. This move has opened the floodgates for state-level AI regulation.

items.title: Slack’s paid users are getting new time-saving AI tools
items.summary: Slack's paid users will have access to new time-saving AI tools including enterprise search functionality, language translation, and meetings.

items.title: Business News: What Richemont And Swatch Group’s Financial Results Say About The State Of The Swiss Watch Industry
items.summary: Watchmakers Richemont and Swatch Group are seeing weak demand and sales in the Swiss watch industry, particularly in China, but there are signs of potential stabilization and surprising strength.

items.title: Command Alkon Named Top Cloud-Based Construction Software Provider of 2025 by Construction Tech Review
items.summary: Command Alkon named top cloud-based construction software provider of 2025 by Construction Tech Review.
